pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.6_0: Ime kho panāyasmanto sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.6_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.8_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.10_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.13_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.15_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.18_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
